title: Ivanti Avalanche JNLP File Improper Access Control Authentication Bypass Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to bypass authentication on affected installations of Ivanti Avalanche. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the handling of JNLP files. The issue results from improper access control. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to bypass authentication on the system.
timeline:
2021-06-30 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2021-11-18 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2022-05-26 - Advisory Updated
